name: OG: Mechanical Mazes
description:
OG is for Old Game. I made this game with GameMaker 6, and... it's a game!

Move the machines with the keyboard, and make them touch to win! Avoid bombs, and use the walls and bouncy(?) blocks to accomplish your goal!

TitleMechanical MazesEstimated Release DateMay 20, 2006My Age at the Time11My Rating Now2/10My Rating Then (Probably)8/10EngineGameMaker 6.0

I dare you to post some of your old games, add the "og" tag, and link to them in the comments below.
